title: Hipstamatic 300 is out. Don’t update yet!
content:
From Life in LoFi: iPhoneography : 
 
Hipstamatic 300 was just released and is a significant update. But Steven Thomas notes that the  app is pretty buggy. 
 
He shares more below and also tells you how to downgrade back to Hipstamatic 280 for now. 
 
Sorry for the rushed nature of this post, but getting this info out is more important right now than aesthetics . 
 
Watch this space for any updates
